title: How did communication improve from the past 20 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: Going trough the motions for human communication, has rocketed out mainly because of the Internet. Real human togetherness is another matter.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Zia Ul Islam

response.answer_text: It has been improved not to include racial slurs, discrimination, equality, ethics, but lost morals.
